content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0) with 50 coal as fuel.

### Stone furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0) with 43 coal as fuel.

### Stone furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0) with 48 coal as fuel.

### Stone furnace at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0) with 18 coal as fuel and has produced 3 stone-bricks.

### Steam engine at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(x=5.5, y=0.5) which is not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5) which is working and has a pipe connection.

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with no power and is set to research automation.

### Pipe groups
There are multiple pipe groups connecting the offshore pump to the steam engine, but the exact connections are not clear.

### Electricity group
There is an electricity group with id 7905, consisting of multiple small electric poles, but the voltage is 0.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected.
- Make sure that the entities are compatible for connection.

### Errors when placing entities
- Check if the entity can be placed at the specified position.
- Ensure that the entity is available in the inventory.

### Errors when crafting items
- Check if all required sub-ingredients are available.
- Ensure that the recipe for the item exists.

### Errors when inserting items
- Check if the item is available in the inventory.
- Ensure that the entity can accept the item.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Check if there are resources available to harvest within reach.

### Errors when using prototypes
- Ensure that the prototype exists and is used correctly.
- Check if the prototype has the required attributes.
